name: Society for Human Resource Management
goal:
Purpose, Mission & Vision

- Our purpose is to elevate the HR profession.

- Our mission is to empower people and workplaces by advancing HR practices and by maximizing human potential.

- Our vision is to build a world of work that works for all.
interests: Borders and Security, Business and Industry, Communication, Culture, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, External Relations, Foreign affairs and security policy, International co-operation and development, Migration and asylum, Research and innovation, Trade, Youth
euInitiatives:
Workplace Immigration
Workforce Development
Workplace Equity
Workplace Flexibility and Leave
